column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Delicious!  My favorite ramen is the wanton chicken
column2: to which I add cabbage.  I also love the Brussels sprouts.  I find somethings the seating feels a little crowded.  There is a large table in the center for community style seating - so if you are not into that and it's busy
column3: you may have to wait.  The restaurant is a bit loud
column5: it works for me.  Service is good
